Class_2.description: Energy use limit for Class 2 buildings is not defined in the NCC.

Class_4.description: Energy use limit for Class 4 parts of buildings is not defined in the NCC.

Class_6.description: Class 6 buildings must have an energy use limit of 80 kJ/m².hr.

Class_5.description: Class 5 buildings must have an energy use limit of 43 kJ/m².hr.

Class_7b.description: Class 7b buildings must have an energy use limit of 43 kJ/m².hr.

Class_8.description: Class 8 buildings must have an energy use limit of 43 kJ/m².hr.

Class_9a.description: Class 9a buildings must have an energy use limit of 43 kJ/m².hr.

Class_9b.description: Class 9b buildings must have an energy use limit of 43 kJ/m².hr.

default.description: All other building classifications must have an energy use limit of 15 kJ/m².hr.
